meanings.definition: A service that provides news stories to newspapers, radio, and television stations.
meanings.sent1: The newswire delivered the latest headlines to the local newspaper.
meanings.sent2: I read the breaking news on the newswire this morning.
meanings.sent3: The newswire must have been working overtime to keep up with all the news.
meanings.sent4: Her brain was like a newswire, constantly feeding her information.
meanings.sent5: The newswire hummed with activity, spreading news far and wide.

meanings.definition: A company that operates such a service.
meanings.sent1: The newswire company had a team of journalists dedicated to reporting news.
meanings.sent2: I applied for a job at the newswire and got hired as a reporter.
meanings.sent3: The newswire company's office was always buzzing with excitement.
meanings.sent4: She ran the newswire company like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: Working at the newswire company was a dream come true for him.
